MemberSignature.Value: static member CreateUserCreationIntent : string * string * string * Android.OS.PersistableBundle -> Android.Content.Intent
public static Android.Content.Intent? CreateUserCreationIntent (string? userName, string? accountName, string? accountType, Android.OS.PersistableBundle? accountOptions);

.method public static hidebysig class Android.Content.Intent CreateUserCreationIntent(string userName, string accountName, string accountType, class Android.OS.PersistableBundle accountOptions) cil managed

Docs.param: Optional name to assign to the user.
Optional account name that will be used by the setup wizard to initialize the user.
Optional account type for the account to be created. This is required if the account name is specified.

Optional bundle of data to be passed in during account creation in the new user via AccountManager#addAccount(String, String, String[], Bundle, android.app.Activity, android.accounts.AccountManagerCallback, Handler).
Docs.summary: Returns an intent to create a user for the provided name and account name.
Docs.returns: An Intent that can be launched from an Activity.

format.a: Java documentation for android.os.UserManager.createUserCreationIntent(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.os.PersistableBundle).

Docs.summary: Returns a list of UserHandles for profiles associated with the user that the calling process is running on, including the user itself.
Docs.value: A non-empty list of UserHandles associated with the calling user.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.UserRestrictions : Android.OS.Bundle with get, set
public virtual Android.OS.Bundle? UserRestrictions { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns the user-wide restrictions imposed on this user. -or- This will no longer work.
Docs.value: a Bundle containing all the restrictions.
